recipe.title: No-bake Chocolate Peanut Butter Bars Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: 1 cup ; graham cracker crumbs, about 8 sheets ; (85 g)
1 cup ; peanut butter, plus an additional 2 Tbsp. ; (240 g)

steps.step: In a bowl, combine the graham cracker, sugar, and butter. Stir. Add in 1 cup (240g) of peanut butter and mix until combined.
Line a 9x9 (22x22 cm) or 8x8 (20x20 cm) pan with foil.
Spread on the peanut butter mixture.
Melt the chocolate chips with the 2 Tbsp. of peanut butter, and spread on top of the graham cracker mixture.
Remove from pan, cut, and serve.
